channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stocks sink in another brutal day, as Trump's tariffs send global shockwaves
item.description: Investors, businesses and consumers all seem terrified of how President Trump's tariffs could upend the global economy.

item.title: Comedian Russell Brand is charged with rape and assault in U.K.
item.description: The criminal charges were announced one and a half years after Brand was accused of sexual misconduct by four women in the fall of 2023.

item.title: The job market remains incredibly healthy â€” but the tariff storm could upend things
item.description: Employers added 228,000 jobs in March, showcasing a solid labor market. But uncertainty over tariffs and tepid consumer spending may weigh on job grow...

item.title: National Security Agency chief fired as Trump ousts another top military officer
item.description: Air Force Gen. Timothy Haugh served just over a year as director of the NSA, the spy agency that collects cyber intelligence worldwide. He's the lates...

item.title: Trade war escalates as China hits back with 34% tariffs on all U.S. goods
item.description: Analysts say the escalating trade tensions between the U.S and China will make a near-term deal to end the trade war "highly unlikely".

item.title: Libya expels aid groups accused of 'African' population plot
item.description: The groups, including the UN refugee agency, are accused of trying to change Libya's "demographic composition".

item.title: Celebrations and sorrow as South Korea president removed from office
item.description: South Korea's constitutional court has unanimously voted to uphold the impeachment of president Yoon Suk Yeol.

item.title: Israel-Turkey tensions escalate over Syria
item.description: Israeli air strikes on bases in Syria are a warning to Turkey to keep its military assets away.

item.title: Russell Brand charged with multiple counts of rape, sexual assault
item.description: British actor and comedian Russell Brand has been charged with multiple counts of rape and sexual assault, London police said.

item.title: Trump administration issues demands on Harvard as conditions for billions in federal money
"48 Hours" show schedule
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: Bollywood actor and director Manoj Kumar dies at 87
item.description: Manoj Kumar was best known for his patriotic films in the 1960s and 1970s.

item.title: South Korea's president has been removed from power: What happens now?
item.description: The constitutional court unanimously upheld the impeachment of Yoon Suk Yeol.

item.title: South and Midwest face potentially catastrophic rains and floods while reeling from tornadoes
item.description: Parts of the Midwest and South are facing the possibility torrential rains and life-threatening flash floods.

item.title: Feb 28: CBS News 24/7, 1pm ET
item.description: President Trump, Vice President Vance and President Zelenskyy exchange heated comments during White House meeting.

item.title: Dow Jones drops nearly 1,500 points as stock market rout deepens
item.description: Stocks continued to tumble Friday in the U.S. after financial markets suffered their biggest one-day drop since 2020.

item.title: Feb 28: CBS News 24/7, 10am ET
item.description: Ukraine's Zelenskyy meeting with President Trump today at the White House to finalize minerals deal; New Orleans rolls out new traffic barriers, feder...

item.title: What to know about the severe storms and flash flooding hitting parts of the US
